headline: Why Gilead Scinces Stock Tumbled on Tuesday
summary: The U.S. FDA ordered a pause on clinical trials of a combination therapy for HIV.  This won't affect the company's other HIV programs, however.  On some negative news about one of its investigational programs, the stock of pharmaceutical company Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ: GILD) took some hits on Tuesday.

headline: Gilead Sciences shares hit after HIV studies placed on hold by FDA
summary: Shares of Gilead Sciences (NASDAQ: NASDAQ:GILD) declined 4% on Tuesday after the company announced that the FDA placed clinical holds on studies of several of its HIV drugs.
